summary: Honest LA insurance detective Joe Peters becomes corrupt after falling in love with sensual gold-digger model Diane.

O'Brien|Monty O'Grady|Gil Perkins|Phyllis Planchard|Joey Ray|Taylor Reid|Stephen Roberts|Dewey Robinson|Janet Scott|Norman Stevans|Bert Stevens|Clarence Straight|Ken Terrell|Dave Willock
title: La emboscada
